New Records: LeBron James surpassed Michael Jordan's mark for most 30-point games in league history with 563 games.
Key Match Events: LeBron James scored exactly 30 points on 13-of-20 shooting and eight assists in 30 minutes.
The historic moment came midway through the fourth quarter when James hit a fadeaway jumper over Onyeka Okongwu.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed that it was very humbling to be mentioned with Michael Jordan, someone he idolized in his childhood.
James mentioned that he wore number 23 because of Michael Jordan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James has done it twice in his first 5 days of being 40.
LeBron James is averaging 27.4 points on 53.7 percent shooting (44.7 percent from three), 8.1 assists and 5.8 rebounds per game in eight starts since returning on Dec. 15.
The Lakers are 6-2 in those games and have moved six games over .500 for the first time since Nov. 19.
